message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but  $11,500 is the absolute lowest I can go.  This price still reflects the value of the product and allows us both to walk away happy. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
